title: Air Canada suspends all Saint John flights, some Moncton trips
description: The Saint John Airport will no longer have flights arriving and departing as of Monday, April 6, as Air Canada suspends more New Brunswick flights.
content: The Saint John Airport will have no more flights arriving and departing as of Monday as Air Canada suspends more New Brunswick flights Saint John Airport director of Commercial Development Jacques Fournier said Wednesday that Air Canada suspended a flight chars
